columns.professional_id: The unique identifier for each professional.
columns.role_code: The job role of the professional.
columns.first_name: The given name of the professional.
columns.street: The street address where the professional resides.
columns.city: The city where the professional is located.
columns.state: The state where the professional resides.
columns.zip_code: The postal code for the professional's address.
columns.last_name: The family name of the professional.
columns.email_address: The email contact for the professional.
columns.home_phone: The home telephone number of the professional.
columns.cell_number: The mobile phone number of the professional.

Professionals.table_description: The table holds information about professionals working at dog kennels.

columns.treatment_id: The unique identifier for each treatment.
columns.dog_id: The unique identifier for the dog receiving treatment.
columns.professional_id: The unique identifier for the professional administering treatment.
columns.treatment_type_code: The code representing the type of treatment provided.
columns.date_of_treatment: The date and time when the treatment occurred.
columns.cost_of_treatment: The monetary cost associated with the treatment.

Treatments.table_description: The table stores treatment records for dogs in the kennel.

columns.owner_id: The unique identifier for each dog owner.
columns.first_name: The given name of the dog owner.
columns.last_name: The family name of the dog owner.
columns.street: The street address where the dog owner lives.
columns.city: The city where the dog owner is located.
columns.state: The state where the dog owner resides.
columns.zip_code: The postal code for the dog's owner's address.
columns.email_address: The email contact for the dog owner.
columns.home_phone: The home telephone number of the dog owner.
columns.cell_number: The mobile phone number of the dog owner.

Owners.table_description: The table holds contact information of dog owners in the kennel.

columns.treatment_type_code: The unique identifier for each type of treatment.
columns.treatment_type_description: The detailed explanation of the treatment type.

Treatment_Types.table_description: The table categorizes different types of treatments for dogs.

columns.breed_code: The unique identifier for each dog breed.
columns.breed_name: The common name of the dog breed.

Breeds.table_description: The table lists various dog breeds available at the kennels.

columns.charge_id: The unique identifier for each charge.
columns.charge_type: The type of charge applied for services.
columns.charge_amount: The monetary amount associated with each charge.

Charges.table_description: The table details various charges incurred for services at the kennel.

columns.size_code: The unique identifier for each dog size category.
columns.size_description: The detailed description of the dog size.

Sizes.table_description: The table categorizes different sizes of dogs available in the kennel.

columns.dog_id: The unique identifier for each dog.
columns.owner_id: The unique identifier for the owner of the dog.
columns.abandoned_yn: Indicates whether the dog has been abandoned.
columns.breed_code: The unique identifier for the dog's breed.
columns.size_code: The unique identifier for the dog's size category.
columns.name: The name given to the dog.
columns.age: The age of the dog in years.
columns.gender: The gender of the dog represented as a single character.
columns.weight: The weight of the dog in specified units.
columns.date_arrived: The date the dog arrived at the kennel.
columns.date_adopted: The date the dog was adopted.
columns.date_departed: The date the dog left the kennel.

Dogs.table_description: The table stores comprehensive information about dogs in the kennel.
